title: G4MF Main Schema
description: The main top-level schema for G4MF files, defining the root JSON object and its properties.

accessors.description: An array of zero or more accessors, which provide a typed view of the data in a buffer view. Accessors are used by meshes and other items.

buffers.description: An array of zero or more buffers. Each buffer contains a blob of raw binary data. Buffers are used by buffer views.

bufferViews.description: An array of zero or more buffer views. Each buffer view is a slice of a buffer. Buffer views are used by accessors.

materials.description: An array of zero or more materials. Each material defines the appearance of a mesh surface.

meshes.description: An array of zero or more meshes. Each mesh is a collection of mesh surfaces that define the geometry of an object.

nodes.description: An array of zero or more scene nodes. If the array is defined and has at least one node, the node at index 0 is the root node of the scene.

shapes.description: An array of zero or more shapes. Shapes are pure geometric objects defined by an enumerated type and a set of size parameters.

textures.description: An array of zero or more textures.
